question: how many dominoes do you need for mexican train
vanilla_rag_result: To play Mexican Train, you typically need a set of double-12 dominoes, which consists of 91 dominoes. This set is suitable for 2 to 8 players. If you have fewer players, you can still use the same set, but the number of dominoes drawn at the beginning of the game may vary. For larger groups, you might consider using a double-15 set, which has 136 dominoes.
